offers.title: Snowboard Rental (Includes Board, boot, and helmet)
offers.description: Comprehensive snowboard rental package includes board, boot, and helmet for convenient day use at nearby resorts.
offers.uniqueSellingPoint: All-in-one snowboard rental with board, boot, and helmet included for hassle-free day rentals.
topFeatures: Includes snowboard, boot, and helmet for a complete rental experience
Available at Deer Valley, Sundance, and other nearby resorts for flexible locations
Suitable for all-mountain snowboarding styles to accommodate various skill levels
Unisex and adult-focused for broad accessibility

offers.title: All-In
offers.description: A versatile directional twin snowboard with a tapered midbite outline for performance and affordability.
offers.uniqueSellingPoint: Innovative tapered midbite outline delivers a unique directional feel at an accessible price point.
topFeatures: Tapered midbite outline enhances directional control for responsive riding
Directional twin construction provides stability and versatility on various snow conditions
Affordable pricing makes high-performance snowboards accessible to more riders
Unisex design accommodates a wide range of riders
techSpecs: Color options: Gray, Black, Orange, White

offers.title: Union Travel Snowboard Bag
offers.description: A durable, easy-to-load snowboard bag designed for weekend missions and mountain adventures.
offers.uniqueSellingPoint: Simple design with ample space for board gear and essentials, built for durability on the go.
topFeatures: Durable construction ensures long-lasting use for frequent travelers
Spacious interior accommodates snowboard and accessory gear
Easy loading design simplifies packing for quick trips
Solid black color offers a classic, versatile look

offers.title: Snowboard Rental Package
offers.description: Same-day snowboard rental package includes board, bindings, boots, and helmet for convenient access.
offers.uniqueSellingPoint: Walk-in same-day rentals with all-inclusive gear and flexible pickup options.
topFeatures: Includes snowboard, bindings, boots, and helmet for a complete rental experience
Same-day walk-in service available for maximum convenience
Flexible pickup and return times to suit user schedules
No additional charge for early or late pickups
Quick equipment fitting with each person taking 10-15 minutes
techSpecs: Rental Duration: 1 day (8 am start, 7 pm return)
Pickup Window: 1 pm previous day, same day, or after 1 pm
Color Options: Black, Red, Gray, White, Multicolor
Recommended Skill Level: All skill levels

offers.description: Durable 7-ply Canadian maple deck designed for skateboarding enthusiasts seeking quality and performance.

topFeatures: 7-ply Canadian maple construction ensures long-lasting durability and strength
Classic board type offers versatile performance for various skateboarding styles
Distinctive character pattern adds unique visual appeal
Built in the USA for quality assurance

offers.title: Salomon Maker Snowboard Bindings
offers.description: Beginner-friendly snowboard bindings offering comfort, support, and easy control for new riders.
offers.uniqueSellingPoint: Soft highback and ratchet strap system provide comfort and secure fit for entry-level snowboarders.
topFeatures: Soft highback support: Offers ankle stability and comfort for new riders
Ratchet strap system: Ensures a secure and adjustable fit on the boot
All-mountain terrain compatibility: Suitable for a wide range of snow conditions
Beginner-friendly design: Makes it easier for new riders to control their board

offers.title: GNU Women's B Nice Snowboard
offers.description: A versatile twin tip snowboard designed for easy, enjoyable freestyle riding on any mountain terrain.
offers.uniqueSellingPoint: Banana hybrid contour and Magne Traction system deliver effortless, controlled rides for women snowboarders.
topFeatures: Twin tip shape offers stability and easy progression for all skill levels
Banana hybrid contour provides a comfortable, forgiving ride
Magne Traction system enhances edge control for better turns
Approachable flex ensures a smooth ride on varied terrain
Freestyle-ready design supports tricks and jumps

offers.title: Gnu Women's B-Nice Snowboard
offers.description: A twin shape all-mountain snowboard with a soft flex, banana rocker, and Magne Traction for easy, playful progression on any terrain.
offers.uniqueSellingPoint: Combines a soft flex, original banana rocker, and Magne Traction for effortless freestyle and all-mountain riding.
topFeatures: Original banana rocker profile: Delivers instant float and easy progression for catch-free turns
Magne Traction edge serrations: Provides reliable edge hold and control in all snow conditions
Soft flex and twin shape: Ensures approachable ride and smooth performance for intermediate riders
UHMW sidewalls: Offer tough, fast, and environmentally friendly durability
Eco sublimated poly top: Adds a tough, eco-friendly topsheet for added protection
techSpecs: Core: G1 Eco Core aspen paulownia (light, strong, poppy)
Laminates: Tri Ax Bi Ax fiberglass (strong, poppy)
Base: Eco sublimated CO EX (fast, tough, easy to maintain)
Stance Set Back: 1722.5 in (varies by size)
